column4: Hello, I need help with mp3 playback in Ubuntu 8.04. Yesterday I could play mp3 files in VLC player, but not today. Today I have installed and uninstalled some libraries when I tried installing sidplay2. But now MP3 is not playing. Totem movie player said I need codecs for MP3 but even when I installed them, it does not play.
amarok will offer to install mp3 decoders if one is not found
so did Totem player, I think. It installed them, I saw it... but I still cannot play them.
any messages when you try to play em?
No, VLC does like playing (Timecode counting) but no sound comes out. Totem player does not start timecode count ... put its play button changes to Pause... like if it was playing.
... but its play button changes to Pause... like if it was playing.
I also installed xmms2.  xmms2 play /home/sven/Desktop/chiptune/firebrandboy_sugar_saviour.mp3
we know the speakers are connected, on and volume up
yes, they are. But even if i try to playbeck an OGG in VLC, I am getting no sound at all.
could try uninstalling player and codec then putting them back in. im stumped otherwise bro
